0.text: Innate - Living Weapon: Upon gaining a set amount of permanent stats from items and stat growth, Kai'Sa can evolve the related basic ability after being in cast time for 2 seconds. The upgrade is lost if the stat requirement is no longer met.
0.html: Innate - Living Weapon: Upon gaining a set amount of permanent stats from items and stat growth, Kai'Sa can evolve the related basic ability after being in cast time for 2 seconds. The upgrade is lost if the stat requirement is no longer met.

1.text: Innate - Plasma: Kai'Sa's basic attacks  on-hit and  Void Seeker apply stacks of Plasma to enemies that lasts 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent stacks and stacks up to 4 times. Her and nearby allies'  immobilizing effects and  polymorphs against enemy  champions will also apply Plasma.
1.html: Innate - Plasma: Kai'Sa's basic attacks on-hit and Void Seeker apply stacks of Plasma to enemies that lasts 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent stacks and stacks up to 4 times. Her and nearby allies' immobilizing effects and polymorphs against enemy champions will also apply Plasma.
markedPassages: on-hit
Void Seeker
immobilizing
polymorphs
champions

2.text: Innate - Caustic Wounds: Plasma stacks applied by Kai'Sa's basic attacks or  Void Seeker deal 4 − 16 (based on level) (+ 1 − 8 (based on level) per Plasma stack before application) (+ 15% − 25% (based on Plasma stacks before application) AP) bonus magic damage. Her next stack against a target with 4 Plasma will instead consume them to deal an additional 15% (+ 5% per 100 AP) of the target's missing health bonus magic damage, capped at 400 against  monsters.
2.html: Innate - Caustic Wounds: Plasma stacks applied by Kai'Sa's basic attacks or Void Seeker deal 4 − 16 (based on level) (+ 1 − 8 (based on level) per Plasma stack before application) (+ 15% − 25% (based on Plasma stacks before application) AP) bonus magic damage. Her next stack against a target with 4 Plasma will instead consume them to deal an additional 15% (+ 5% per 100 AP) of the target's missing health bonus magic damage, capped at 400 against monsters.
markedPassages: Void Seeker

15% (+ 5% per 100 AP) of the target's missing health

monsters

0.text: Active: Kai'Sa releases a swarm of 6 missiles that evenly distributes among nearby  visible enemies, each one hitting their target after 0.4 seconds and dealing physical damage.  Minions below  35% health take double damage.
0.html: Active: Kai'Sa releases a swarm of 6 missiles that evenly distributes among nearby visible enemies, each one hitting their target after 0.4 seconds and dealing physical damage. Minions below  35% health take double damage.
markedPassages: visible
Minions
35% health

1.text: Non-minions take 25% damage from missiles beyond their first.

0.text: Active: Kai'Sa fires a void bolt in the target direction that grants  sight around its trajectory as it travels, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit, applying 2 Plasma, and  revealing them for 4 seconds.
0.html: Active: Kai'Sa fires a void bolt in the target direction that grants sight around its trajectory as it travels, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit, applying 2 Plasma, and revealing them for 4 seconds.

revealing

1.text: Living Weapon: Requires  100 ability power from items to upgrade – Void Seeker applies 3 Plasma instead and  reduces its cooldown by 77% if it hits an enemy  champion.
1.html: Living Weapon: Requires  100 ability power from items to upgrade – Void Seeker applies 3 Plasma instead and  reduces its cooldown by 77% if it hits an enemy champion.

0.text: Active: Kai'Sa charges up over the duration of the cast time, during which she is still allowed to move, becomes  ghosted and gains  bonus movement speed, increased by 0% − 100% (based on bonus attack speed).
